@brenes Can you send me an e-mail with your opinions/ideas?
RT: @mstrohm: check out Mark's poster: Analyzing Human Intentions in Natural Language Text http://bit.ly/u9VZa. Really inspiring!
@isforinsects We've been crawling for 6 months --crude approach :( Exchanging data/ideas would be great! Want to discuss it by e-mail?
@isforinsects Only speak for myself but think a public Twitter "corpus" would be valuable+convenient. Lacking of it I'm collecting my own.
